vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.47
§ Gahar = "hiding place"
the head of a family of temple slaves returning from exile with Zerubbabel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jefe de familia; sirvientes del templo; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
迦哈 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "藏身之處"
跟隨所羅巴伯被擄歸回的家族領袖之一，為聖殿殿役
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
迦哈 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "藏身之处"
跟随所罗巴伯被掳归回的家族领袖之一，为圣殿殿役
